sub_title: Experienced IT Manager | 12+ years' exp in IT Operations Management and Project Management | Microsoft Specialist | MCSA | MCP | NSE |
summary:
As a highly experienced IT Operations Manager with over 12 years of experience, I have demonstrated expertise in IT infrastructure management, network management, disaster recovery, IT security, compliance, and budget management.

I possess strong vendor management and team leadership skills, and I am adept at utilizing automation to drive efficiencies and streamline processes. My excellent communication skills enable me to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders, ensuring successful project completion while meeting business objectives.

My passion for IT extends beyond my professional career, as I am always seeking to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry trends. I am confident that my skills and experience make me a valuable asset to any organisation seeking a skilled IT Manager.

My key responsibilities include:

•	Managing a team of IT professionals to ensure the successful implementation and maintenance of technology infrastructure, applications, and systems.

•	Developing and implementing IT policies, procedures, and standards to ensure the security, reliability, and availability of the organization's technology assets.

•	Coordinating with cross-functional teams, including software development, quality assurance, and project management, to ensure seamless integration of technology solutions.

•	Identifying and resolving operational issues related to the organization's technology infrastructure, systems, and applications.

•	Collaborating with vendors and third-party service providers to manage technology solutions and ensure adherence to service-level agreements.

•	Monitoring and analyzing performance metrics to identify opportunities for improvement and ensure the effectiveness of IT operations.

•	Managing the budget and resource allocation for the IT operations department.", 'title': 'Senior IT Operations Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 14560987, 'name': 'ESR-REIT', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQFW3jq6jh6FRQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1668737328360/esr_logosreit_logo?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=zxBMbZvZ6VuzyoIipyprYxIOkzxQs7KjLgVS23ApYUA', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/esr-logosreit/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Singapore', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'ESR-LOGOS REIT', 'description': "As an IT Manager, I am responsible for overseeing the day-to-day operations of the IT department. My duties include managing a team of IT professionals, developing and implementing IT policies, and ensuring the company's technology infrastructure runs smoothly.

In this role, I have led numerous successful projects, including the migration of our data center to a cloud-based solution, which resulted in cost savings and increased efficiency. I have also implemented an ITIL-based service desk to improve incident management and request fulfillment.

I am experienced in managing budgets and have successfully managed our IT budget to ensure that we stay within plan. I am also responsible for vendor management, ensuring that we receive quality IT services and products from our third-party providers.

In addition to my technical skills, I have strong leadership and communication skills, which have enabled me to effectively manage my team and build strong relationships with stakeholders across the organization.
